text:
Norwegian Mathematical Olympiad 2016 Q2

\begin{array}{l}\na+b=c d \quad b \geq a \\\nc+d=a b \quad d \geq c \\\n{\left[x^{3}+2 y^{3}+4 z^{3}=9 !\right.}\n\end{array}[imath]a+b=c d \quad b \geq a [/imath] [imath]c+d=a b \quad d \geq c [/imath] [imath]{\left[x^{3}+2 y^{3}+4 z^{3}=9 !\right.}[/imath]
